meanings.definition: A person or thing that stinks or emits a foul odor.
meanings.sent1: The skunk was a real stinker in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was full of stinkers after a week.
meanings.sent3: The stinker of a rotten egg made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The stench from the dumpster was a real stinker in the alley.
meanings.sent5: The foul stinker in the room made it unbearable to stay.

meanings.sent1: The movie turned out to be a real stinker at the box office.
meanings.sent2: The project was a stinker due to lack of planning.
meanings.sent3: The party was a stinker when the cake fell on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The test results were a stinker for the students who didn't study.
meanings.sent5: The play turned out to be a stinker despite high expectations.

meanings.sent1: Getting lost in the maze was a real stinker for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The math problem was a stinker for the students to solve.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fix the broken car was a stinker of a task.
meanings.sent4: The obstacle course was a real stinker for the contestants.
meanings.sent5: The hiking trail turned out to be a stinker with unexpected challenges.
